text: Weary Willie's Rags is a 1914 American silent film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Harry Lorraine - Henry Paff * Ben Walker - William Ragson * Oliver Hardy - Hotel Clerk (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Filmography of Oliver Hardy ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: Weary Willie's Rags
